info.name: Scrollbar Custom - KMV
info.description:
Custom Scrollbars


Arrows are BASE64 X-Icons.
For the tech-savvy, these can be replaced by images/icons of one's own choosing.
Backup of each colour-option included in the code to experiment with.


Tested on Brave, Chrome, Chromium, Firefox, Firefox Nightly & Tor.

Arrow-Colour is reserved for Brave, Chrome and Chromium 'till Mozilla decides otherwise.

Incompatible with Waterfox for the time being.


Theme is in the Public Domain.
Feel free to use in your own CSS.


The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/
info.additionalInfo:
2021-09-16 Updated description.

2020-09-28 Included secondary scrollbar background (in browser windows)

2020-06-09 Changed description after further testing, and increased default :hover and :active up one hue for better visibility.

2020-04-15 First published
